name: webpack-typescript

sideEffect-Comment.noteLine01: A side effect is defined as code that
sideEffect-Comment.noteLine02: performs a special behavior when imported,
sideEffect-Comment.noteLine03: other than exposing one or more exports.
sideEffect-Comment.noteLine04: An example of this are polyfills, which affect
sideEffect-Comment.noteLine05: the global scope and usually do not provide an export.

description: typescript that will use webpack to manage packages
author: Ryan Lee
